artist: Artist: James Turrell; Printer: Peter Kneubühler, Zurich, Switzerland; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
description: Cross section of the bowl of the Roden Crater, Arizona, the cinder cone of an extinct volcano.
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, LL margin: EA
medium: Aquatint, photoetching, etching, soft-ground etching, and drypoint
signed: Signed in pencil, LR margin: James Turrell
title: Mapping Spaces: Fumarole
